description:
Experience and enthusiasm -- those are the attributes of one of South Carolina's most respected law offices, Douglas Jennings Law Firm, LLC, of Bennettsville.

Founder Douglas Jennings is a former state legislator and recipient of the University of South Carolina's Complete Lawyer Award; he provides the experience -- more than 30 years building strong cases for people in the Pee Dee Region.

Up and coming associate Mason King is an assertive and articulate attorney with strengths in personal injury and criminal defense; he provides the enthusiasm.

Our firm is known for its successes in representing South Carolinians injured in car and truck accidents. Our attorneys also represent plaintiffs in the areas of workers' compensation, bad faith insurance claims, medical malpractice and Social Security Disability (SSD) appeals.

Besides our plaintiff work, however, we place special emphasis in two niche litigation areas: representation in parole proceedings, and defense against eminent domain and condemnation.

Clients know they can turn to our lawyers for our knowledge and experience in the law, our experience in the statehouse and courts, and our commitment to the beautiful community where we live and do business.

Our offices are located on Broad Street in Bennettsville in the historic Strauss House -- over a century old. We invite you to visit with us there and discuss the particulars of your case.
